name: City Swinging Prototype
description:
Tech demo for two-handed swinging mechanics, not animated yet. You can swing using both hands simultaneously.

WASD for movement.

LMB or Left Control for shooting rope using left hand.

RMB or Left Alt for shooting rope using right hand.

SPACE for super jump.

The city building models (White City), skybox (Wispy Skybox) and some textures are all obtained freely from the Unity Asset Store.
